content: My good friends! My humble request is to disarm all nuclear weapons as it poses a risk of nuclear attacks during wars.

Though we are faced with the imminent threat of nuclear annihilation, our ultimate objective of solidifying international influence has been realized. We have no desire for continued aggression; all we wish is for further economic growth and territorial expansion. We call upon the U.N. for support.
[ENCRYPTED]: This is not a joke. You are being threatened with nuclear weapons.
